articles.title: Philippines sees highest working-hour losses in ASEAN in 2020 –ILO report - GMA News Online
articles.description: The Philippines saw the highest working-hour losses in Southeast Asia in 2020 amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a report by the International Labor Organization (ILO).
articles.content:

articles.author: Mike Schneider
articles.title: Census data: US is diversifying, white population shrinking - Associated Press
articles.description: No racial or ethnic group dominates for those under age 18, and white people declined in numbers for the first time on record in the overall U.S. population as the Hispanic and Asian populations boomed this past decade, according to the 2020 census data.
articles.content: No racial or ethnic group dominates for those under age 18, and white people declined in numbers for the first time on record in the overall U.S. population as the Hispanic and Asian populations boom… [+5069 chars]

articles.title: Indonesian parents grieve for child Covid-19 victims - The Borneo Post
articles.description:
JAKARTA (Aug 13): Tirsa Manitik gave birth to her first girl in June and buried her a month later -- another casualty of virus-battered Indonesia's soaring child death toll.

The Southeast Asian nation has been hit by its worst Covid-19 surge yet as the ult…
